widget.name: Dynamic Data Generator
widget.description: Sample data generator widget that produces a continuous simulated feed of stock quotes for fake companies. With each (simulated) new stock quote, this widget passes the data through the OpenAjax Hub to any other widgets that might be listening. There is a corresponding dyndatavis widget which subscribes to the message and then displays updated information as it is received.

property.name: highlow
property.description: Holds the high and low stock prices for the list of companies whose stocks are being watched. The property value is a JavaScript object with properties 'tName' (the stock ticker name), 'high' (new high value), and 'low' (new low value).
